# binaryLinkedFunctions

**Instance Property**

Provides the array of binary functions to link.

## Declaration

```swift
var binaryLinkedFunctions: [any MTL4BinaryFunction]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Binary functions are shader functions that you compile from Metal IR to machine code ahead of time using instances of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4Compiler].
title: binaryLinkedFunctions
